refnamediv.refpurpose: Tool to convert PAPYRUS 3.0 to DICOM.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The gdcmpap3 command line program takes as input a PAPYRUS 3.0 file (file-in) and process it to generate an output (pseudo) DICOM file (file-out). The command line option dictate the type of operation(s) gdcmpap3 will use to generate the output file.

para.literallayout:
file-in DICOM input filename
file-out DICOM output filename

-S --split Split multiframes PAPYRUS 3.0 into multiples DICOM files --decomp-pap3 Use PAPYRUS 3.0 for decompressing (can be combined with --split). --check-iop Check that the Image Orientation (Patient) Attribute is ok (see --split).

-h --help print this help text and exit
-v --version print version information and exit
-V --verbose verbose mode (warning+error).
-W --warning warning mode, print warning information
-E --error error mode, print error information
-D --debug debug mode, print debug information
